channel.title: Dragon claws problem
channel.description:
Hi can someone help me i need to know how to change dragon claws damage like when i use special i only hit 1-2-4-6 my highest how i change
Source: Torvapkz Type: 317

item.title: Dragon claws problem
item.dc:creator: @XmbrockstarX XmbrockstarX
item.description:
@XmbrockstarX wrote:

Hi i did what u did and now cant run my server this is what my claws stats are at atm

item = 14484 Dragon_claws A_set_of_fighting_claws. 0 0 0 41 57 -4 0 0 13 26 7 0 0 56 0 item = 14485 Dragon_claws A_set_of_fighting_claws. 0 0 0 41 57 -4 0 0 13 26 7 0 0 56 0 item = 14486 Dragon_claws A_set_of_fighting_claws. 0 0 0 41 57 -4 0 0 13 26 7 0 0 56 0

THEN COMBAT ONE

case 14484: c.gfx0(1950); c.startAnimation(10961); c.specAccuracy = 10.0; c.clawDamage = 0;

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon claws problem
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

go into item.cfg searsh up ur dragon claws and raise the str bonus

item = 14484 Dragon_claws A_Powerfull_Dragon_claw. 120000 120000 120000 41 57 -4 0 0 13 26 5 0 0 56 0

thats 56 is the str bonus , in ur case raise it

  • if ur normal hit is kinda okay, but only ur spec sucks change ur spec damage

go into combatassistant.java searsh up ur d claws (what is mostly in PI servers: case 14484:

case 14484: // Dragon claws c.startAnimation(6000); c.doubleHit = true; c.specDamage = 1.10; c.specAccuracy = 2.25; c.usingClaws = true; c.specEffect = 5; c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase()); break;
then raise ur c.specDamage

and done

Read full topic
